Package co.cookies.sdk.storefront.v1

Class MenuRequestSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cookies.sdk.storefront.v1.MenuRequestSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    @NotThreadSafe
public final class MenuRequestSpec
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Specifies information related to a request for menu data from the Menu Service, part of the Cookies Storefront API; this class implements Version 1 of the API.

    The following items are supported with regard to Menu API inputs:

    • Content locale: The content locale controls the copy language, currency, and time/date formats.
    • User location: If known, the user's location can be provided to generate a tailored menu payload.
    • Store key: If explicitly selected (or otherwise known), a store selection or hint can be sent.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MenuRequestSpec addProductLines​(cookies.schema.ProductLine... productLines)
      Mutate the current menu request specification to include the specified product lines; if the product lines are already included, this is a no-op.
      MenuRequestSpec clearProductLines()
      Mutate the current menu request specification to clear the set of current product lines; after calling this, product lines should be added with addProductLines(ProductLine...), or the request will default to including all product lines anyway under the hood.
      static MenuRequestSpec defaults()  
      boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)  
      static MenuRequestSpec forLocale​(java.util.Optional<java.util.Locale> locale)
      Return a menu request specification for the provided with the provided content locale; this method does not provide a facility to customize a menu based on a user's location.
      static MenuRequestSpec forStore​(cookies.schema.StoreKey key)
      Return a menu request specification for the provided store, with the default locale; this method does not provide a facility to customize a menu based on a user's location.
      static MenuRequestSpec forStore​(cookies.schema.StoreKey key, java.util.Locale locale)
      Return a menu request specification for the provided store, with an explicit locale; this method does not provide a facility to customize a menu based on a user's location.
      static MenuRequestSpec forUser​(java.lang.String userId, cookies.schema.store.model.UserLocation location, cookies.schema.StoreKey storeKey, java.util.Optional<java.util.Locale> locale)
      Return a menu request specification for the provided user, addressed by their account ID, within the default content locale, and with no specified store, but with a known or estimated usr location.

      Return a menu request specification for the provided user, addressed by their account ID, within the default content locale, and with no specified store.

      • clearProductLines

        @Nonnull
public MenuRequestSpec clearProductLines()
        Mutate the current menu request specification to clear the set of current product lines; after calling this, product lines should be added with addProductLines(ProductLine...), or the request will default to including all product lines anyway under the hood.
        Returns:
        Mutated menu request spec.

        Mutate the current menu request specification to include the specified product lines; if the product lines are already included, this is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        productLines - Product lines to add to this request.
        Returns:
        Mutated menu request spec.

      • forLocale

public static MenuRequestSpec forLocale​(@Nonnull

        Returns:

        See Also:
        to generate a store menu within a locale.

        See Also:

      • forStore

        @Nonnull
public static MenuRequestSpec forStore​(@Nonnull
                                       cookies.schema.StoreKey key,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       java.util.Locale locale)
        Return a menu request specification for the provided store, with an explicit locale; this method does not provide a facility to customize a menu based on a user's location.
        Parameters:
        key - Store to generate a menu for.
        locale - Content locale to generate a menu for.
        Returns:
        Menu request specification for the specified store, and the specified locale.
